[`static let axial: CAGradientLayerType`](/documentation/quartzcore/cagradientlayertype/axial)An axial gradient (also called a linear gradient) varies along an axis between two defined end points. All points that lie on a line perpendicular to the axis have the same color value.[`static let conic: CAGradientLayerType`](/documentation/quartzcore/cagradientlayertype/conic)[`static let radial: CAGradientLayerType`](/documentation/quartzcore/cagradientlayertype/radial)## [Relationships](/documentation/quartzcore/cagradientlayertype#relationships)
